MENU1_1.caption: rxMode emuNAND
MENU1_1.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on emuNand.

MENU1_2.caption: rxMode sysNAND
MENU1_2.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on sysNand.

MENU1_3.caption: PastaMode
MENU1_3.description: Patches signature checks and load in sysNAND with GBA and DSi support.

MENU2_1.caption: Decrypt CTR Titles
MENU2_1.description: Decrypt 3DS titles directly on the console.

MENU2_2.caption: Decrypt Title Keys
MENU2_2.description: Decrypt title keys stored in tickets.db which is needed to decrypt CDN content.

MENU2_3.caption: Decrypt encTitleKeys.bin
MENU2_3.description: Decrypt the private key of a game.

MENU2_4.caption: Generate Xorpads
MENU2_4.description: Generate XORpads needed to decrypt and encrypt 3DS titles.

MENU2_5.caption: Decrypt partitions
MENU2_5.description: Dump and decrypt all sysNAND or emuNAND partitions (except the TWL partition for now).

MENU2_6.caption: Generate fat16 Xorpad
MENU2_6.description: Generate XORpad needed to decrypt main NAND partition.

MENU3_1.caption: Create NAND dump
MENU3_1.description: Backup your sysNAND or emuNAND partition. It is highly recommended to backup your sysNAND partition.

MENU3_3.caption: Dump NAND Files
MENU3_3.description: Dump various important files from sysNAND or emuNAND.

MENU4_1.caption: Inject emuNAND partitions
MENU4_1.description: Encrypt and write partitions from files on SD card into emuNAND (except the TWL partition for now).

MENU4_2.caption: Inject NAND Files
MENU4_2.description: Inject various important files from SD card into sysNAND or emuNAND.

MENU5_1.caption: Downgrade MSET on SysNAND
MENU5_1.description: Install old MSET in sysNAND to be able to use the DS profile exploit on firmwares 5.x-9.2.

MENU5_2.caption: Install FBI over H&S App
MENU5_2.description: Install FBI (a legal .cia installed) over Health&Safety application in sysNAND.

MENU5_3.caption: Restore original H&S App
MENU5_3.description: Uninstall FBI .cia installer and restore the original Health&Safety application.

MENU5_4.caption: Advanced File Manager
MENU5_4.description: Choose a firmare file on SD card and load it.
